nodes.text: Fnast Drexler was a male Arcona tactician in the employ of Lady Valarian that lived during the Galactic Civil War.

Around 1 ABY, Drexler was part of a group of 'outside help' hired by the Whiphid crime lord Lady Valarian to act as her command staff in raids against her rival, the Hutt, Jabba Desilijic Tiure. He, along with the rest of the group; Careem, Iris Tanada Sinclair, Arkahn Greystar and Emanon, setup headquarters in the Valarian Strategic Command Bunker on the planet Tatooine where they were guarded by a large number of Valarian's guards and Blood Vandals. From this bunker they launched and coordinated their attacks on Jabba. Drexler was eventually killed along with all of the other commanders by a spacer hired by Jabba to stop the raids.
Fnast Drexler first appeared as an enemy in the MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies in which they must be killed by the player to progress in the main quest line. He has made no other appearances to date.
